schema.description: Mints a new token to be sold in a future sale. The message fields are defined and sent to the corresponding token contract defined as the token_address in the instantiation to mint. We use a vector of MintMsg to facilitate bulk minting for projects.

extension.description: Any custom extension used by this contract

publisher.description: The original publisher of the token

owner.description: The owner of the newly minter NFT

token_uri.description: Universal resource identifier for this NFT Should point to a JSON file that conforms to the ERC721 Metadata JSON Schema

schema.title: Crowdfund Mint

alerts.text: Only the contract owner can execute Mint
Minting is only allowed before a sale starts
The limit for the number of MintMsg that can be defined at once is 100
Only available to the Minter defined in the ADO.

ui:options.title: Extensions Used
ui:options.description: Any custom extension used by this contract

ui:options.title: Token Media URL
ui:options.description: A URL to any multi-media attachments.

ui:options.title: Token Attributes
ui:options.description: The metadata of the token if it exists can be 1 to many

ui:options.title: Attribute Display Type
ui:options.description: The string used to display the attribute, if none is provided the trait_type field can be used.

ui:options.title: Token Description
ui:options.description: An optional description of the token.

ui:options.title: Token Source URL
ui:options.description: A URL to the token's source.

ui:options.title: Original Token Publisher
ui:options.description: The original publisher of the token (immutable).

ui:options.title: Token YouTube URL
ui:options.description: A URL to a related Youtube video

ui:options.title: Token/NFT Owner
ui:options.description: The owner of the newly minted NFT.

alerts.text: In order to be included in the sale, the owner must not be specified or set as the crowdfund contract.

ui:options.title: Token URI
ui:options.description: Universal resource identifier for this NFT Should point to a JSON file that conforms to the CW721 Metadata JSON Schema.
